# cx
The ComputeX Python CLI lets you interact with ComputeX REST APIs and push images for your models to the ComputeX container registry.

## Installation

### Requirements
- Python >= 3.8

Run `pip install cx`.

## Command Line Interface

### Logging In
```python
cx login --user {username} --password {password}
```
